testcase.classname: Verify the functionality of AskGanesha Love site
testcase.name: Verify the appearence and functionality of Love Link on AskGanesha Home Page
testcase.system-out: Given I see the Love Link...................................................passed When I click on the Love Link...............................................passed Then I confirm that the Love page is displayed..............................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the functionality of AskGanesha Love site
testcase.name: Verify the presence of Ask a question on love and Compatibility report
testcase.system-out: Given I confirm that the Love page is displayed.............................passed Then I see the headers Askaquestiononlove and Compatibility report..........passed

testcase.classname: Verify the functionality of AskGanesha Puja site

testcase.system-out: Given I am on the AskGanesha Puja Page......................................passed When I see the GauriShankar Puja Link.......................................passed And I see the Ladoo Gopal Maha Anusthan Link................................passed Then I confirm that AskGaneshaPuja Page is displayed correctly..............passed
